title: jaya tungAtarangE
sahitya:
jaya tungAtarangE gangE jaya tungAtarangE


anupallavi

  kamlabhavANDa karaNDa pavitraE bahu vidha bandacchEdalavitrE


caraNam 1    dUri krtajana pApa samUhE pUrita kacchapa gucchagrAhE
    caraNam 2    paramahamsa gurumaNita caritrE brahma viSNu shankara nutipAtrE
